body: The raw for the mother is not uploaded? Unrelated to the story, but why do people say the way to enjoy Netorare is by self-insert as the cucked victim? Non-H works aside, in ero-manga it seems easier to self-insert to the perpetrator most of the time rather than as the victim, looking at the gap in screen time and action.
